channel.title: OS on Caifeng
channel.description: Recent content in OS on Caifeng

item.title: Linux
item.description: This post indicates the possible steps or problems that I have met when install Debian on my old computer. It’s not a beginning tutorial with too many details. If you have no experience of any other linux os installation, you better find other tutorials in case to wast more time. If you have already some experience of linux os installation like Ubunto, Mint, Kali, whatever, and you have also an old computer that you don’t want to throught it away, then this post may help you a little.
